message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for a price of $13,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $11,000.  Would you be willing to go lower?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $11,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,000?
